Text: Pattole Palome:  The fourth edition of the Pattole Palame was published in 2002 by the Karnataka Kodava Sahitya Academy.

Text: Pattole Palome:  Nearly two thirds of the book consists of folksongs that were handed down orally through generations.

Text: Pattole Palome:  Many of these songs are sung even today during marriage and death ceremonies, during our festivals relating to the seasons and during festivals in honour of local deities and heroes.
